SELECT ci.NAME as class_name, ci.id as class_id, lcb.create_time, lcb.lession_id as lession_id, (select count(1) from user where class_id=lcb.class_id and del_flag=#{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}) as total_num, (select count(1) from studio_info where lession_id=lcb.lession_id and del_flag=#{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} and user_id in (select id from user where class_id=lcb.class_id and del_flag=#{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL})) as complete_num, (select count(1) from studio_info where lession_id=lcb.lession_id and del_flag=#{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} and pointer is not null and user_id in (select id from user where class_id=lcb.class_id and del_flag=#{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL})) as pointed_num,
(select count(1) from studio_info where lession_id=lcb.lession_id and del_flag=#{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} and pointer is not null and point >=8 and point <= 10 and user_id in (select id from user where class_id=lcb.class_id and del_flag=#{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL})) as num_a, (select count(1) from studio_info where lession_id=lcb.lession_id and del_flag=#{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} and pointer is not null and point >=4 and point <= 7 and user_id in (select id from user where class_id=lcb.class_id and del_flag=#{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL})) as num_p, (select count(1) from studio_info where lession_id=lcb.lession_id and del_flag=#{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} and pointer is not null and point >=0 and point <= 3 and user_id in (select id from user where class_id=lcb.class_id and del_flag=#{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL})) as num_e FROM lession_class_bind lcb JOIN class_info ci ON lcb.class_id = ci.id and lcb.del_flag=#{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} order by lession_id
